attributes.action: Conduct anti-competition review and regulate the shipping industry
attributes.additional_details: Ask Competitions & Market Authority Watchdog to investigate container shipping lines for possible evidence of collusion and price-fixing. Implement an industry watchdog to regulate shipping lines to ensure all surcharges are justified.
attributes.background: Competitions & Market Authority Watchdog to investigate container shipping lines for possible evidence of collusion and price-fixing. Implement an industry watchdog to regulate shipping lines to ensure all surcharges are justified.

rejection.details:
The detail of what the Competition and Markets Authority investigates is an operational matter for the CMA, and the UK wouldn't be able to unilaterally regulate an international industry. 

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to commission a review of competition in the shipping industry.
